articles.title: Study shows how dietary saturated/trans fats promote liver tumorigenesis - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Fatty foods harm our health. Prior research has established a link between the consumption of dietary fats and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease, which subsequently leads to inflammation and tumor formation in the liver.
